name: Hà Nội - Capital city
subtitle: Red river Delta Vietnam
description: The capital of Vietnam. As a capital of 1000 years of history, Hanoi hosts more cultural and historical sites than any other city in Vietnam.

name: Hải Phòng
subtitle: Red river Delta Vietnam
description: Haiphong is the third-largest city in Vietnam and is the principal port city of the Red River Delta.

name: Vĩnh Phúc
subtitle: Red river Delta Vietnam
description: Vinh Phuc is a province located in the North, favored by nature for many beautiful scenes and scenic areas such as: Tam Dao - a foggy town with quiet landscape.

name: Bac Ninh
subtitle: Red river Delta Vietnam
description: Nestled in the heart of Northern Vietnam, Bac Ninh Province beckons travelers with its rich heritage, captivating traditions, and picturesque landscapes.

name: Hưng Yên
subtitle: Red river Delta Vietnam
description: Hung Yen, nestled in the heart of the Red River Delta, boasts a dynamic blend of cultural heritage and economic vibrancy.

name: Thai Binh
subtitle: Red river Delta Vietnam
description: Coming to Thai Binh, tourists enjoy visiting inshore sandbanks where rare birds stops, seeing natural beauty in mangrove forest, swimming in Dong Chau Beach, and joining interesting traditional festivals. Well-known culture constructions are Dong Bang, Tien La temples, and Keo Pagoda.

name: Nam Dinh
subtitle: Red river Delta Vietnam
description: Nam Dinh city is one of the city which had been established very soon in north viet nam, it has many famous churches, temples

name: Ninh Binh
subtitle: Red river Delta Vietnam
description: Ninh Binh is a wonderland of ancient, modern and natural Vietnam that attracts millions of tourists each year.

name: Ha Nam
subtitle: Red river Delta Vietnam
description: Ha Nam is located on south of Red River Delta, southern gateway of Hanoi.
